1065220.name: Smile For Me - Official Artbook
1065220.description:
...an ARTBOOK?!?

LIMBOLANE, the creative duo behind Smile For Me, bring you a tome chock-full of tasty morsels from its creation. The artbook is stuffed with over 100 pages of goodies, including remastered assets, early sketches, and never-before-seen artwork. Enjoy detailed concepts, promotional art, and tons of drawings of the game's characters.

Creators Yugo Limbo and Day Lane provide oodles of commentary, sharing brand-new insights into how this strange game was cooked up. There's no better place to learn about the weird world of the Habitat, and appreciate the art that makes Smile For Me so special.

The Smile For Me Artbook is DRM-free pdf, perfect for your collection!
1065220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
